 Resets the palette system and sets the new number of palettes.

 Returns total free mem for palettes.
int NE_PaletteFreeMemPercent (void)
 Returns percent of total free mem for palettes.
void NE_PaletteDefragMem (void)
 Defragment memory used for palettes.
void NE_PaletteSystemEnd (void)
 Terminate palette system, frees memory used by it and prevent any palette from loading.

 Enables modification of given palette. Returns a pointer to the data.

Detailed Description

Functions to manipulate texture palettes.

void NE_PaletteModificationEnd ( void   ) 

Ends modification of palettes.

Use this DURING VBL.

void* NE_PaletteModificationStart ( NE_Palette *  pal  ) 

Enables modification of given palette. Returns a pointer to the data.

Parameters:
pal Palette to modify.
Use this DURING VBL. YOU MUST USE NE_PaletteModificationEnd() WHEN YOU FINISH. IF YOU DON'T, GPU WON'T BE ABLE TO RENDER THE TEXTURES TO SCREEN.

void NE_PaletteRGB256SetColor ( u8  colorindex,
u16  color 
)

Set color number "colorindex" to "color".

Parameters:
colorindex Index to change.
color New color.
Use this DURING VBL.

void NE_PaletteSystemReset ( int  palette_number  ) 

Resets the palette system and sets the new number of palettes.

Parameters:
palette_number Max number of palettes. If lower than 1, it will create space for NE_DEFAULT_PALETTES.
